{{cpp/experimental/pmr/monotonic_buffer_resource/title|do_is_equal}}
{{cpp/experimental/lib extensions/pmr/monotonic_buffer_resource/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=libfund_ts|1=
virtual bool do_is_equal( const memory_resource&amp; other ) const noexcept;
}}

Compare {{c|*this}} with {{c|other}} for identity - memory allocated using a {{tt|monotonic_buffer_resource}} can only be deallocated using that same resource.

===Return value===
{{c|1=this == dynamic_cast&lt;const monotonic_buffer_resource*&gt;(&amp;other)}}
